title: Where can I get Teleneue font by Hubert Jocham? (seen in Surface and Details magazine)
content:
Where can I get Teleneue font by Hubert Jocham? (seen in Surface and Details magazine)

I know that Hubert Jocham's site is at [http://www.hubertjocham.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015041930/http:/www.hubertjocham.de/ "http://www.hubertjocham.de") I also Know that I am not the first person to ask for this on this forum. What I do not Know, however, is if I can obtain the font.
author: Alfonso

comments.content:
Alfonso,

I would just contact him and ask. I bet he know himself if they are avaialble or not! It might be that they are custom made for these magazines though, and still not yet available as retail faces.

Cheers

Teleneue is not, [TeleVoice](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015041930/http:/www.hubertjocham.de/item.php/type/sans/TeleVoice/) is. _(Just see for yourself and check the originally mentioned url — [www.hubertjocham.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015041930/http:/www.hubertjocham.de/ "www.hubertjocham.de").)_

Dav
